channel.title: Comments on: French Pipe
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: By: james
item.dc:creator: james
item.description: Great Flavor! I was somewhat hesitant to try this one at first so I ordered the smallest container. It is now my favorite. One of the best Tobacco Flavors I've ever tasted! Full bodied with a very nice aftertaste.
item.content:encoded: Great Flavor! I was somewhat hesitant to try this one at first so I ordered the smallest container. It is now my favorite. One of the best Tobacco Flavors I’ve ever tasted! Full bodied with a very nice aftertaste.

item.title: By: sara
item.dc:creator: sara
item.description: Black tea & sweet tobacco are the dominant flavors. My favorite so far of the tobacco like juices. It is robust and not cloying
item.content:encoded: Black tea & sweet tobacco are the dominant flavors. My favorite so far of the tobacco like juices. It is robust and not cloying
